effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.platinum: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.platinum: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.
